name: The Phoenix Partners
overview: The Phoenix Partners is a venture capital firm specializing in early, start up, and mid stage investments. The firm seeks to invest in the information technology, Internet, software, communications, and networking sectors. It typically invests between $100,000 and $3 million in a transaction. The firm prefers to invest in the West Coast of the United States. The Phoenix Partners was founded in 1982 and is based in Seattle, Washington.
